appendix.title: Eeek! There is Missing Help
appendix.para: We are sorry. The help item you are looking for, is missing. You may be able to find it in the online version of the GIMP documentation .
Feel free to join us and fill the gap by writing documentation for GIMP. For more information, subscribe to our Mailing list. Generally, it's a good idea to check GIMP's documentation project page.

Found a content error or just something which doesn't look right?
Report a documentation error and let us know.
